title: I live on Oak Island. I am curious how people who live on the beach side can build piers that completely cross one side of Davis Canal, cross Montgomery Slough, and then end in a dock on the other side of Davis Canal? If you look on Google Earth you will see some piers running at angles across neighbors private property (particularly around South 19 street). I don\'t see how this can be legal.
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. I apologize for the delay in answering. http://www.myreporter.com/?p=10030
